messages.subject: Passing the hat
messages.msgSnippet: I didn t ask last year, but here s a polite passing-of-the-hat, for expenses for last year and this. Thanks for considering it! Short request:
messages.messageBody:
I didn't ask last year, but here's a polite passing-of-the-hat, for expenses for last year and this. Thanks for considering it!

Short request: http://sandradodd.com/2019/

Longer version: http://sandradodd.com/2019/longer

Way more info: http://sandradodd.com/2019/toomuch
(Way more info than most people want)

The biggest deal this year is that Just Add Light just passed 3,000 posts a few days ago!

https://justaddlightandstir.blogspot.com


The more people who post here, the busier this forum can be, so please do think of questions to stir Always Learning up! I’m happy to participate.

If you don’t have a question, but there’s a topic you think would be good for people to remember, or to play around with, bring it up! Or send me a note if you’re shy, and I can.

Thanks,

Sandra
